      • Recipe

        public Recipe​(java.lang.String recipeName,
              java.lang.String cuisineName,
              int numberOfEaters)
        constructor for class Recipe
        参数:
        recipeName - the name of the recipe
        cuisineName - the name of cuisine the recipe belongs to
        numberOfEaters - the number of people who would have the dish
